Admin Commands
==============

The admin API allows to write commands for the KalaPy admin scripts. Currently,
KalaPy doesn't allow you to write custom command in your project but provides a
:ref:`set of commands <admin_scripts>` to help you managing your KalaPy project.

.. currentmodule:: kalapy.admin

.. autoclass:: CommandError
    :members:

.. autoclass:: Command
    :members:

.. autoclass:: ActionCommand
    :members:

.. autofunction:: execute_command
